titleStmt.title: A genealogical history of the kings of Portugal, and of all those illustrious houses that in masculine line are branched from that royal family containing a discourse of their several lives, marriages, and issues, times of birth, death and places of burial, with their armes and emblazons aaccording to their several alterations, as also their symboles and mottoes : all engraven in copper plates / written in French by Scevole and Lovis de Saincte-Marthe, brethren, and advocates in the Court of Parliament of Paris, unto the year MDCXXIII ; rendered into English, and continued unto this present year, MDCLXII by Francis Sandford ...
Histoire genealogique de la maison de France. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Sainte-Marthe, Scévole de, 1571-1650.
Sainte-Marthe, Louis de, 1571-1656.
Sandford, Francis, 1630-1694.

biblFull.extent: [10], 141, [5], 53 p. : ill., coats of arms, folded geneal. table.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.M. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Histoire genealogique de la maison de France.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
